name: Melnor Adjustable Rear Trigger Nozzle - Heavy Duty Zinc Construction
description: This heavy duty Melnor Adjustable Rear Trigger Nozzle features an Adjustable tip that sprays from mist to jet so you can tackle a variety of watering jobs. The nozzle's trigger lock feature allows for continuous spraying. Adjustable tip features a mist or jet spray for a variety of watering jobs.Assembled dimension: 1.38 in. W x 3.5 in. D x 5.38 in. HHeavy duty zinc body construction with metal nozzle for durabilityInsulated rubber handleTrigger lockSqueeze handle for easy control of water flow
